From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron growled deeply. She unsheathed her drill sword and stood beside 
Dinobot, prepared to fight the first Pred that came through those doors:

"As long as the shields hold we should be safe, but they won't hold for 
long."

Tavatron could feel the ark vibrate with every shot the Preds fired. At this 
rate their sheilds wouldn't last more than a few cycles at best. Liono had 
done his best to protect the ark, but there is only so much one 'bot can do:

"I shall face my fate as a warrior. Whether victorious or not I shall defend 
this ship and the Maximal history housed within as best I can."

Tavatron didn't let on just how frightened she was. She welcomed the coming 
battle, but the fear still lingered. She had lost some good friends in a 
pointless war steller-cycles ago, but this time they were prepared. They 
would not surrender the ark.
